content:
Thanks for the encouragement! I think I'll celebrate my progress by treating myself to some new sculpting tools. I've been eyeing a few new modeling tools that I think would help me achieve some of the details I want in my next piece.

Speaking of which, I've been thinking about entering that local art competition I mentioned earlier. I think I'll start brainstorming ideas and researching different materials and techniques to use. Do you have any tips on how to approach a competition like this?
